column1: Should the next #coronavirus treatment 1. Go head to head against #remdesivir & replace it 2. Show benefit when added to #remdesivir Tell us why!
Locust swarms the size of cities Ebola Coronavirus Poverty, famine, deaths of despair 2020 has been off to a rough start ... Hoping we turn the corner soon

Thank Christos!  So the range of mortality associated with patients hospitalized with pneumonia due to Coronavirus is somewhere between 5.7% and up to 19%  ... very very broad https://twitter.com/ChristosArgyrop/status/1222667015363682304 …

150,000 patients were admitted this year in the US with the flu and 8,000 died. That is 5%, not 10% as you state. The confidence interval around that number is much tighter than that for Coronavirus and we have greater certainty around that 5% number.
These are 99 people hospitalized with Coronavirus pneumonia and 11 died, that is 11%. I hope we can agree on that fact. The confidence interval is quite broad though.
The latest Above The Fold in Healthcare! https://t.co/b0q8BlNOqD Thanks to @JohnCendpts #coronavirus #covid19
